org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb

Class MongoDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.mongodb.MongoDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatastoreConfiguration<MongoDBGlobalContext>

    public class MongoDB
extends Object
implements DatastoreConfiguration<MongoDBGlobalContext>
    Allows to configure options specific to the MongoDB document data store.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigurationBuilder

        public MongoDBGlobalContext getConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: DatastoreConfiguration
        Returns a new store-specific GlobalContext instance. Used by the Hibernate OGM engine during bootstrapping a session factory, not intended for client use.
        Specified by:
        getConfigurationBuilder in interface DatastoreConfiguration<MongoDBGlobalContext>
        Parameters:
        context - configuration context to be used as factory for creating the global context object
        Returns:
        a new GlobalContext
